org.mindswap.owl.vocabulary
Class Vocabulary

java.lang.Object
  org.mindswap.owl.vocabulary.Vocabulary
Direct Known Subclasses:
FLAServiceOnt, MoreGroundings.Java, OWLS_1_1, OWLS_1_2, OWLS_Extensions.Process, OWLS_Extensions.Termination
public abstract class Vocabulary
extends java.lang.Object

This class can be extended by concrete OWL vocabulary declaration classes and it realizes a TBox containing the union of all (lazily initialized) vocabularies that extend this class.

Currently, this class is extended by the OWL-S vocabulary classes, plus some extensions.

Method Detail

addAlternativeLocation

protected static java.lang.String addAlternativeLocation(java.lang.String original,
                                                         java.lang.String copy)
This method simply delegates to OWLKnowledgeBaseManager.setAlternativeLocation(URI, URI) of the internal KB. The given strings will be converted to standard URIs first, see URIUtils.standardURI(String).

getOntology

protected static OWLOntology getOntology(java.net.URI ontologyURI)
Parameters:
ontologyURI - The URI of the ontology that is supposed to be in this knowledge base. (Note that it must have been loaded before, see loadOntology(String)).
Returns:
The target ontology or null if it does not exist in this knowledge base.

loadOntology

protected static OWLOntology loadOntology(java.lang.String ontologyURL)
Utility method to be used by the various vocabulary definitions, i.e., the sub classes. If the ontology to be loaded imports other ontologies they will be loaded as well, i.e., the method loads the ontology including its import closure (if any).

Parameters:
ontologyURL - The URL where the ontology can be loaded from.
Returns:
A reference to the loaded ontology.
Throws:
java.lang.InternalError - In case the attempt to load the ontology failed for some I/O problem. Note that this "hard" exception is thrown because this represents a fatal error rendering the API unusable.

loadOntology

protected static OWLOntology loadOntology(java.lang.String ontologyURL,
                                          java.lang.String local)
Utility method to be used by the various vocabulary definitions, i.e., the sub classes. If the ontology to be loaded imports other ontologies they will be loaded as well, i.e., the method loads the ontology including its import closure (if any).

The loaded ontology is in read-only state by default, i.e., OWLOntology.isReadOnly() returns true.

Parameters:
ontologyURL - The URL where the ontology can be loaded from.
local - An alternative local copy of the ontology in the search path that will be tried after loading the ontology from its URL failed. Value may be null - skips attempt to try alternative.
Returns:
A reference to the loaded ontology. The ontology is read-only.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - In case the attempt to load the ontology failed for some I/O problem. Note that this unchecked exception is thrown because this represents a fatal error rendering the API unusable.
